nodes.text: Gherjnuthal was a tradition in Hynestian culture that involved the eldest child of the royal family embarking on a mission of benevolence and righteousness before turning fourteen years old. When she was caught attempting to return the Solstice Globe to Livno III after the smuggler Lando Calrissian was ordered to deliver it to the Galactic Empire, Princess Rinetta Gan claimed to be following the tradition to evade any punishment.
